#### Project Information

*   Project identifier: R.109222.001
*   Title: Podium and Stair Renovation
*   Address: 300 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, ON
*   Project description: This project requires repairs and upgrades to stairs and handrails leading to the podium area at L'Esplanade Laurier. The work includes concrete repairs, replacement of a waterproof membrane, leveling materials, and reinstatement of pavers on the podium.
